alert.note: Alert for Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:35PM MDT until April 15 at 3:45AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Poplar River Near Poplar affecting Roosevelt County. For the Poplar River...including Poplar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poplar River Near Poplar. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Low lying areas near gage site begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM MDT Thursday was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 9.8 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.2 feet on 04/08/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning by 1100 AM MDT.
